M

magenta - 类 中的静态变量view.GameModel
A color.
main - 程序包 main
Contains two core classes.
main(String[]) - 类 中的静态方法main.MainApp
The beginning of the application, create an instance of MainApp.
mainApp - 类 中的变量main.GameLabyrinth
Keep the reference of its generator.
MainApp - main中的类
Managing different labyrinths on the top-level.
MainApp() - 类 的构造器main.MainApp
The constructor.
maze - 程序包 maze
Contains all classes for modeling the labyrinth as a two dimension array.
maze - 类 中的变量main.GameLabyrinth
The abstract format of the labyrinth.
Maze - maze中的类
Abstract format of the labyrinth, representing it in a two-dimension Array.
Maze(String, int, int) - 类 的构造器maze.Maze
 
MazeReadingException - maze中的异常错误
Exception occurs when the labyrinth size is not correct.
MazeReadingException(String, int, String) - 异常错误 的构造器maze.MazeReadingException
 
MazeWrongSymbolException - maze中的异常错误
Exception occurs when there are unrecognizable symbols in the file.
MazeWrongSymbolException(int, int, char) - 异常错误 的构造器maze.MazeWrongSymbolException
 
MBox - maze中的类
Modeling a vertex in the graph.
MBox(Maze, int, int) - 类 的构造器maze.MBox
 
modifyBoxColor(int, int, byte) - 类 中的方法main.GameLabyrinth
Verify the legacy of modifying the attribution of a box.
mouseClicked(MouseEvent) - 类 中的方法main.GameLabyrinth
Invoked when the mouse button has been clicked (pressed and released) on a component.
mouseDragged(MouseEvent) - 类 中的方法main.GameLabyrinth
Invoked when a mouse button is pressed on a component and then dragged.
mouseDragPress - 类 中的变量main.GameLabyrinth
Record the position when beginning to drag the mouse.
mouseDragRelease - 类 中的变量main.GameLabyrinth
Record the position when ending dragging the mouse.
mouseEntered(MouseEvent) - 类 中的方法main.GameLabyrinth
Invoked when the mouse enters a component.
mouseExited(MouseEvent) - 类 中的方法main.GameLabyrinth
Invoked when the mouse exits a component.
mouseMoved(MouseEvent) - 类 中的方法main.GameLabyrinth
Invoked when the mouse cursor has been moved onto a component but no buttons have been pushed.
mousePosition - 类 中的变量main.GameLabyrinth
Record continuously the mouse position.
mousePressed(MouseEvent) - 类 中的方法main.GameLabyrinth
Invoked when a mouse button has been pressed on a component.
mouseReleased(MouseEvent) - 类 中的方法main.GameLabyrinth
Invoked when a mouse button has been released on a component.
